attributes.action: Stop the European Nuclear Research Centre (CERN) experiment from taking place on September 10, 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop the CERN experiment from taking place on September 10, 2008. This is clearly a violation of our human rights.LHC experimenters are tinkering with the unknown and putting mankind — and our whole planet — at risk. These scientists are playing God, warning that no one can guarantee that the black holes will not survive, rapidly growing in size & suck the Earth out of existence in an instant. The general public have NOT been informed or consulted about this potentially cataclysmic event, until it was uncovered today in the press.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
